name: Hexlock Archetype
entries: As bullets fly from the chamber, runes along the bullet suddenly burst to life, casting a golden tail behind the bullet as it flies forth. The bullet lands true between the ghast's head and for a second the undead monstrosity merely recoils from the impact before a burst of gold blasts out its eyes and mouth, the creature slumps to the ground, dead.

As a Hexlock you merge the complex machinery of firearms with the equally complex nature of magic. You possess a multitude of magical enhancements that can be placed on ammunition, turning your bullets into sanctified missiles, explosive ordinance, or bolts of lightning.
